title: Is California Separating Children from Parents Who Have COVID-19?
subtitle: Someone apparently was hell-bent on scaring families with false rumors during the already stressful coronavirus pandemic.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: A letter from California authorities warns that residents who receive state assistance benefits will no longer be eligible for them if they don't get tested for COVID-19; further, if parents test positive, children in their household who test negative will be placed in temporary foster care until their parents/guardians recover.
